first_party.author: Thryrallo
first_party.name: Avatar Performance Tools
first_party.description: Shows VRAM and more performance metrics

third_party_curated.author: Pumkin
third_party_curated.name: Pumkin's Avatar Tools
third_party_curated.description: An editor script that adds tools to help you setup avatars faster and easier. It includes a component copier that makes it a lot easier to reimport your avatars, and tools to make your thumbnails nicer.

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Among Us Follower
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: hfcRed
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: A very simple, one step set up, self contained crewmate follower.

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Avatar 3.0 Emulator
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: Lyuma
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: In-editor emulation of VRChat's Avatar 3.0 PlayableGraph in the editor

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Entorix Collision Trigger
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: Entorix
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: A basic particle death stop-action/avatar dynamics based collision detector that allows the triggering of animations when the gameobject collides with a generic collider

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Entorix FAB Flight and Boost
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: Entorix
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: A Simple prefab for VRChat 3.0 Avatars that lets you fly and boost forward (while in the air)

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Expanded Avatar Hand Interactions (EAHI)
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: Faycal#6941
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: Allows your hands to interact with other people's body parts in the form of visual special effects, sound effects, haptics, along with interacting with your own body as well. Multiple SFX, VFX, toggles are included. Project is under MIT license.

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Expressions Menu Hierarchy Editor
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: Haï~
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: Edit your avatar menus as if they were objects in your scene hierarchy.If your menu has parameters that are missing from your VRCExpressionParameters asset, you can still upload your avatar. It will generate disabled icons that do nothing.

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Eyes Kit
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: Mothblocks and Peptron1
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: Editor script used for setting up a set of cameras and animations to allow an avatar to \"see through their hands\"

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Gun Constraint
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: The_Impiersonator
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: A prefab that allows the usage of both hands to aim a gun and move it around you avatar's body while only using a single 3D model, with only 2 constraints.

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Hop Follower + Super Ultra Combat Critters
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: MMMaellon
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: A set of prefabs that adds a critter to your avatar that follows you by hopping around. If you install the full Super Ultra Combat Critters version, your avatar can fight other people's critters to earn badges with a turn-based combat system.

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Inventory system generator for Avatar 3.0
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: Merlin
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: Script for generating inventories in Avatar 3.0

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: MuteMarker
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: kittyn
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: Particle-based marker that lets you pick up and set down the canvas - with 1-click installer

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Player Tracker
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: hfcRed
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: A system which allows you to select and attach a tracker to any standard avatar contact on any player.

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Unity 2018 to 2019 Cloth Transfer
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: Haï~
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: Cloth Transfer is a Unity Editor tool that lets you transfer cloth constraints of a mesh from a Unity 2018 project into a Unity 2019 project.It was created mainly to assist migration from Unity 2018 to Unity 2019 in the VRChat social platform.

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: VRC Gesture manager
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: BlackStartx
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: A tool that will help you preview and edit your avatar animation directly in Unity. Available for both VRChat SDK 2.0 and SDK 3.0, in Unity 2018 or 2019.

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: WorldSync
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: Juzo
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: A prefab to help keep your world drops Synchronized for late joiners.

third_party_vrcprefabs.name: Worldlock AutoSetup
third_party_vrcprefabs.author: Voyage
third_party_vrcprefabs.description: A small Unity tool to setup World Locked objects on avatars
